ygData.subject: Ok, Here's another, then.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been playing my monk since the first week the game was released.   My played time is now about 4 day, 6 hours.  Is this about right for a lvl 11 guy?
ygData.messageBody:
I've been playing my monk since the first week the game was released. My played time is now about 4 day, 6 hours. Is this about right for a lvl 11 guy? What are your played times for your lvl 32 monk? I'm just interested in knowning if I'm behind the curve here. I just dont have the patience to get to lvl 17! It is frustrating. Right now I'm in Befallen, as a lvl 11. Is there a more appropriate place that I should go perhaps? Right now I'm not worried about RPing too much, because I die way too much, so I guess that means I just want to lvl ASAP. Where's a good place to get EXP at my level? Grouping tips/anything would be appreciated.

Maerjyon <The Keepers>, E'ci
